To potentially free up the pinned knight?
moves.5... Ne7 6. Nb5 Bxd2+ 7. Qxd2 O-O: Maybe cxd4 would be better to weaken the pawn structure
moves.8. c3 b6 9. f4 Ba6 10. Nf3 Qd7 11. a4 Nb: Now the c6 knight is choked
moves.19... h6 20. Rfc1 Rfc8 21. Rc2 Qe8 22. R: The gun is formed. Black's knight on c6 is under tremendous pressure.
moves.26... Rbc8 27. Ba4: To potentially threaten with the b-file pawn
moves.27... b5 28. Bxb5 Ke8 29. Ba4 Kd8 30. h4: And Black resigned. There are no good moves left; he will lose material.
